website_summaries.verdict: One of the best VR-ready rigs that offers great gaming and VR/AR performance in a complete kit.
pros: Liquid-cooled Intel CPU keeps interior cooler than fans alone
Computer can run most VR programs and typical games at high-resolution and performance settings
cons: Tower case has limited number of spots for extra cooling fans for better temperature management

customer_reviews.title: Did not get what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: I get that this build is a steal, but as soon as I opened it up I knew something seemed fishy. Mine came with a Radeon RX 460 as the gpu (which is insulting), had only 2 slots for ram with only 1 slot being used by an 8 GB stick, and did not have an upgraded heat sink for the cpu. I didn't even take off the default heat sink to see the cpu becuase i expect that it also was not what I paid for. In fact, based on other reviews, the only 2 things that I found that I was expecting were the case and the 1 TB WD Blue. It's pretty unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Tomeo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer
customer_reviews.text: So far this computer set up like a dream. I plugged it in started windows did a few updates and I was done. I have had zero issues with the computer. I checked every component and it matches what was listed because I know that has been an issue but they all match.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I was going into with uneasy expectations but in the end it surprised me with it's fantastic performance. Games and editing software run smoothly without any lag whatsoever. Not to mention that it already had built in Bluetooth! I almost spent money on a adapter. Would definitely recommend this computer to anyone buying a pc for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great condition everything works
customer_reviews.text: GUYS the way you make it boot up is to go to bios and switch to the hard drive that has windows installed. Great condition everything works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Check Everything!
customer_reviews.text: This PC was delivered yesterday and I am shocked. The intel I7 7700k was downgraded with an intel i7 7700. That's a difference of 4.2GHZ to 3.6GHZ non-overclocked.... Promised 16GB DDR4 ram. Received 8 GB DDR4 ram. After reading another post saying that their computer was missing thermal compound, I checked the temp and it is running hot. At idle, 65 - 70 C. The single exhaust fan on the back is not working. All internal cords appear well connected. First thing I do with a new computer is use internet explorer to download another browser. I go to Google to search and I get two spyware pop-ups. I couldn't even believe it. Worst computer buying experience ever.
customer_reviews.author: clifford van tyle

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed that this was not configured prior to packaging
customer_reviews.text: System came with no drive active with OS. Had to go into the Bios on startup and change the drive boot order to the SSD drive that Windows 10 was installed on. A little disappointed that this was not configured prior to packaging. A reputable company should have better quality control. I have experience with thjs type of things, and knew what to do. Most consumers do not and would have been very frustrated if it had happened to them. Only 4 stars due to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: G. Keffer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly one of the best purchases I’ve done in a while. Runs great, preforms well and easy to set up. The only problem I have is I can’t get the RGB remote to work, but that might just be me being stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast Gaming Computer For The Money!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how they make any money off this awesome computer! Went online to get prices for it. Would cost 200 or more than they sold it. It worked flawlessly out of the box. Had a little issue with registering windows, but after reboot it was fine. Added a 4 tb hard drive with ease. My son loves this very fast computer. Best Buy’s closest priced system had 120 gb ssd vs 240 gb and 1060 video card vs the 1070. In same case. So far it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Frank D Dees

customer_reviews.title: A good bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: As expected, it handles Assassin's Creed Origins, on Ultra, without any problems. MUCH quieter than my self-built 2009 rig, even when I'm playing demanding games. iBUYPOWER should definitely set them up with proper boot instructions in the BIOS. I had no problem but those not familiar with the process may struggle. For that reason, plus the mediocre motherboard, it gets 4 instead of 5 stars. The motherboard only matters if you expect to upgrade components in the future. The high end processor, video card and 16 G of memory make it a good bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: LetzRoq

customer_reviews.title: Overall great but the WiFi adapter is awful
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering a PC through Amazon. Upon receiving it was packaged fairly well. The computer fired up easily; did updates great and did it all with ease and speed. With that aside; the wireless wifi adapter is awful. It worked great the first day. Ever since there’s been spotty WiFi. I see most of the comments on here had the same issue; but for the amount you pay that shouldn’t be an issue; especially within two days of being out of the box. I haven’t called Ibuypower customer service yet but I’m going to have to because this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Tarrahbithia

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: One problem I had was with the vagueness of the directions. To someone who knows very little about PC's and PC building, "check that the cables were not disconnected" isn't very helpful information. Several cords seemed to be disconnected but the machine seems to be running fine without them. Maybe there's nothing wrong with it at all and it is supposed to be that way but the instructions were no help. They pretty much just told me to take the giant piece of foam out over and over again. Thanks, but I don't think anyone is confused about that part.
customer_reviews.author: Tristen Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Setup: very easy, step-by-step pictures provided Boot up: Very Fast, this is my first SSD After full windows patching, I was up and running inside 45-minutes I am not overclocking anything! Gameplay: Huge improvement over my AMD FX 870-K Destiny 2 is running with all High settings, not a whine out of the fans. Very quiet system BattleTech is running with all High settings, not a whine out of the fans. All Steam games run without issue. I have not had to call tech support at this time, everything was functioning out of the box! I would recommend either a larger internal drive or external drive. 1.2 TB is not a lot of space these days.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: So I the first PC I bought came broken and got a replacement, the second pc gave me a lot of trouble with the resolution and signal being lost frequently I have managed to keep it stable since then and other than that the PC works fine and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Trejo

customer_reviews.title: Fast, powerful computer with room for upgrades
customer_reviews.text: Ive been doing alot of homework and window shopping for a pc the last 4-6 months. I finally decided on this unit, i am a music producer and use alot of cpu/memory hungry programs that were causing my other computer to lag and crash. Since getting this new pc i have had zero issues running multiple programs at the same time. Computer is quite, fast, and powerful. Cool LED's on the outside and inside of the case, tempered glass cover. 4 usb 3.0 slots, up to 3 monitor connections and 16gb of ram. I upgraded my ram to (2) 16GB Cosair DDR4 ram but was not necessary
customer_reviews.author: Johny HammerSticks

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my failing unit. It was a much needed upgrade and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rhinebolt

customer_reviews.title: Great PC company/product
customer_reviews.text: I know my exact setup is no longer offered on this page but I want to write a review more about the company. I have had my PC for almost a year and a half and the only things I have touched on it are doubling the RAM (exact matching set) and adding a NVMe drive to speed up the boot process. I work in IT and have pushed the components to their limits off and on from playing games, running renderings and major multitasking. My setup has ranged from 2 4K monitors and 1 1080P monitor to 1080P and 1440p ultra wide.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hill

customer_reviews.title: A long time waiting
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking to upgrade from my laptop for a long time for the purpose of recording, streaming, and video editing. I spent nearly a year both saving and browsing for the right fit and finally found it. This is the fastest system I've ever owned, I'm now able to get games recorded at 1080p60 frames per second, which was one of my goals when I was looking for the upgrade. It is a huge tower, so I do need to look into finding a better stand to sit it on, but overall I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just a week since i got the product. it works quiet and performs quite well. But, we all know that computers slow down as we exploit them. The set-up of windows took a while, but not to annoying. I purchased it with discount through Amazon Prime Day and using it for gaming and general use for home. Starts and shuts down really quick, which I like very much. The only complain so far, that it has no DVD drive. I should have read description, so I take it to be my fault!
customer_reviews.author: Hummedov Family

customer_reviews.title: Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an absolute BEAST! I made sure to do a ton of research before pulling the trigger on a purchase and it just made sense to go with this. For what I am doing, this pc meets the task with ease. First thing I did was add a few more fans to keep the gpu temps down a bit. Decided to move the modem in my house so that i'm able to hard-line after noticing that the wifi constantly would disconnect and was quite unreliable. Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: It looks cool but the radiator connected to the cooler was just dangling and there were not any screws for it and Windows would not install from the hdd its supposed to be booted from. I called Ibuypower tech support and was told to fill out a forum to get screws sent which i assume would take a week or two to get (i bought my own screws) and was rudely told to buy an external usb disk drive in order to use the windows disk to boot. Overall terrible experience and I would never buy from Ibuypower again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming/youtube desktop
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son to record his gaming sessions, record video and edit video for upload to youtube. This thing is blazing fast and is completely silent! Prime day deal made it an easy decision.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My VR runs so seamlessly
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My VR runs so seamlessly. The product says it comes with wifi USB adapter, but it is built into the tower. I went looking for it before i noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Fooj

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this PC a little over a year ago and absolutely LOVE it. An absolute beast, If you are looking to run 60 FPS this comp will run anything you have on max settings and never drop below 60 FPS. I run most of my games at 120 FPS with G sync and it rarely ever dips below 120 unless you are in a public event on Destiny 2 or some game with a big opened world. I can run most competitive FPS games (Overwatch/CSGO) at 144 FPS no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Garbark

customer_reviews.title: Great first gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Had this PC for a week now. I use it everyday for at least 10 hours a day. I bought it for my Oculus Rift and the games ran without a hitch. I also played steam games and so far no crashes, no sudden restarts. The PC is surprisingly quiet and the design of the case is stunning. Some of the things I would upgrade will be the usb wireless adapter, keyboard and mouse. Other than that, this is a fantastic buy. I will definitely buy from iBuypower again. Their products are not only value for money but they have great customer and technical support on their website as well.
customer_reviews.author: bea

customer_reviews.title: Faulty gpu
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this would have been a good pc for gaming, however, mine came with a faulty graphics card. The hassle to get ibuypower to replace it was so great that I just sent it back to Amazon and bought a cyberpower gaming pc. It upgraded the cpu to the 8700k and is liquid cooled for just a little more money. It runs like a dream and I haven't been able to slow it down with anything yet. The only limit I have is my crappy internet.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Every thing I would expect and runs great. The only thing keeping it from 5 stars are lack of manuals or quick setup guides. I didn't have a problem (IT background) but I can see others might. Especially if they wanted to add some additional hard drives. Plus both the the top USB ports didn't work out of the box. Got one to work by re-seeding the cable on the mobo but the other one still doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Howard L Rescoe JR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome PC for the price
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot about computers and have built a few myself, this PC is a great price for all the parts that are inside and it can run pretty much anything that is optimized from PUBGs to Witcher 3. Great PC. This was my first time purchasing from iBuyPower and I would purchase another PC again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kaykrisify

customer_reviews.title: Have been wanting a nice gaming machine for the last few years but do ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been wanting a nice gaming machine for the last few years but do to price I’ve Stayed on consoles. But this machine ma specs and price were perfect. Also there’s enough room in the case for future upgrades. Runs quite and boots fast. PUBG on Ultra settings looks amazing so does Rising Storm-Vietnam. Bad ass machine totally worth the price, especially with the i7-7700 at 4.2 and a GatX 1070
customer_reviews.author: Supermom

customer_reviews.title: Very Efficient System with Plenty of Room to Grow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pc on Prime Day and got it for $300 off. So far, it has handled every game I've thrown at it with ease. These include Battlefield 5, Dauntless, and Crackdown 3 on Ultra at 60fps. I'm very pleased with the purchase. The GPU is made by Gigabyte and I was only able to overclock it 165mhz up to about 2000mhz. The system is air-cooled using the quietest fans I've ever heard. At 100% GPU fan power I couldn't hear it at all. The motherboard is made Aorus. Overall I'm very happy with this purchase. I would definitely recommend for casual gamers like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Used for flight simulator with yoke, pedals, throttle and joy stick at times. Mostly X plane 9. Also running 3- 32” 1080p monitors. Works great except needs more than 8MB of Ram to run well b/c high graphics levels make it fail & default to lower graphics setting.
customer_reviews.author: Dave n.

customer_reviews.title: Good Computer and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to start off by saying that I am not a very tech savvy person. I have always loved gaming and being able to use technology, but I don't know the first thing about it. This computer was extremely easy to set up. I was able to easily set it up straight out of the box. The only issue I had was that I was trying to load up from the wrong drive. I contacted the tech support and they were really helpful and efficient in directing me on where to go and how to do it. I don't know what's wrong with the poor reviews, but I have had a very pleasant experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: I usually build my own computer always and this was the first time in which I decide it to buy a premake one its great best computer ever
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing PC that I could’ve got on sale for Black Friday, purchased in October for full price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for the price of 1,399$, I recently saw on Black Friday it was on sale for 999$ I think. Either way it’s still a great computer because of its graphics card and ram etc. it’s my first PC and it can literally run any game that is out right now from 60 frames to higher. I love this PC great product. If I wasn’t so Impatient I could’ve waited till Black Friday for a better deal but either way it’s pc pieces are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Loveypups

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming PC!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this PC, it runs amazing and everything came as advertised. Ready to use right out of the box with a really easy set up. The only thing that I don't really like about it is the LED lighting but that is just a small downside. For someone who doesn't know much about building a PC or someone that just wants to start up PC gaming right away iBUYPOWER is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Cole W

customer_reviews.title: ... use with my Oculus Rift and I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this PC in December 2017 to use with my Oculus Rift and I am very pleased with it. The only thing I did was to change the power supply from 500w to 1000w, after a couple days the remote for the PC light stopped working but I just gave the remote a little tap and it was alright again. I have not incurred any other problems with this PC. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nasayah

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!  Amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: You simply can't beat the performance for price of this system. I can play any game, at full resolution, with zero lag or stutter. Also very quiet; I can barely hear it running when I'm sitting near it. It can not be heard at all from just a few feet away. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dspowell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Fantastic!!! Only 2 days from order to Front door! After researching over days and weeks, IBUYPOWER Price for the specs could not be beat. This was a hands down winner. Computer super easy to set up, looks Gorgeous and Performs exactly as Promised! I did have one question and was relieved knowing I was calling a number in the United States. I was connected to a technician within 2 minutes and understood every word he spoke with ease, lol :) Highly recommend If you want Quality and brand name Parts and not generic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernierhome

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy and Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. It was so easy even a non-techie could follow the directions to set this up in no time. The computer is incredibly fast!!! I almost can't believe it. I'm SOOO happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Computer came undamaged
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Computer came undamaged, however, the WIFI USB dongle it came with would not provide internet, It connected to my network but said the internet was unavailable. Also the battery in the lighting remote came dead on arrival. I am worried about the power supply going out on me and damaging the computer so I plan to replace that soon by myself. Other than the Dongle and remote note working, this is a great computer for the price, everything worked right out of the box that mattered. I could barely be more satisfied with the money I spent. <3 Thank you Ibuypower and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Fast and quiet PC
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this machine. My old computer was dying and I tend to buy highly rated, prebuilt computers that match a similar specification of what I would build myself. Purchasing through Amazon gives me a sense of security in that they have always take care of me. Additionally, I have had great luck with iBuyPower machines. The system came packaged well, started up clean and fast. It took me a few minutes tops to get going and now I am running all my former programs on this machine. Everything runs fast and smooth and the machine is much quieter than my previous PC.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: And it is so pretty! Comes with a cool keyboard and mouse too
customer_reviews.text: My old computer was 7 years old. I can not believe how fast this one is! And it is so pretty! Comes with a cool keyboard and mouse too! I love how fancy it looks! I am still setting it up but I can't wait to game on it! I was worried about the new games taking more resources but I am ready now! Yes, I am in love!
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Besides having to buy a dvi adapter to get a display this is a steal. For 1300 you arnt going to find a computer with the same parts for cheaper. This thing rips through most triple a games maxed out at 1440p while staying above 60fps
customer_reviews.author: Roy R Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: A good desktop, but no dp port or optical DD
customer_reviews.text: It's my first pc, and I'm learning more about the pc world but it is running great so far! Only issue is that the rgb lighting within did not work for me, had to hold the connection an exact way for it to light up. Not a deal breaker though, not worth sending back for that. Overall it is a great system! BTW, there's no ODD, or DP outlet
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for music and visual production
customer_reviews.text: I use this computer as my main music recording and production suite, with occasional video editing. I could not be happier with how perfectly it functions for those purposes. This wasn't something that was an initial factor when I was looking to buy, but it doesn't hurt that it runs so quiet. I don't even have to wire the computer from another room when I'm tracking like I did with my old setip. Slow downs from processing-heavy plugins are a thing of the past. I won't be needing another computer for the next 10 years. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron D. Navetta

customer_reviews.title: Great PC for work or play.
customer_reviews.text: Nice PC, i use it for my work PC needing it for crunching numbers, marketing, videos, security etc. The AM900Z handles it all. It is extremely quiet. My only con is that it has limited USB ports and you can not add a USB card because there aren't any expansion slots. I need those to connect 2 scanners, printer, backup drive, mouse and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: REID WESTPHAL

customer_reviews.title: Bought this on Prime Day and received it today. Set up went perfectly
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not a "gamer" I needed to replace a computer that i built for myself. I do alot of photo, video and music related things on the computer and like a computer with good specs. i7...good amount of RAM, good graphics card and these days those are bundled into Gamer computers. This PC checked all of the boxes for me and the price was where I needed it to be considering the specs. Ordered it on Monday and received it today (Thursday). Very pleased with the machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ballenberg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Power
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking for a decent desktop I couldn't decide on what I wanted. I came across the ibuypower products and started digging into more about this product and let me tell you. I'm blown away at the power and how well this product performs. I like the look, the keyboard and mouse. I will definitely be using this much more and doing a ton with it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Philip Robershaw

customer_reviews.title: Great value gaming computer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for my husband that needs more capability not just for gaming but also for coding purposes. This was on sale on Amazon at an amazing value. The computer is beautiful for the ambient lighting and has great memory! Highly suggested for moderate gamers, and for someone that wants great SSD and general performance.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Meco

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He says it's fast and works well for his gaming needs. The color remote not so good, cheaply made and you have to put it right up against the left side in order to work. Had to buy a DVI cable to hook up the monitor. Make sure you have the right cables it will make a diffence iin picture quality. Going to attempt to hook up a second monitor see how that goes. All and all my son likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Solid performance, slick styling & easy setup
customer_reviews.text: This PC is great! The packaging was top-notch, the unpacking was simple with easy setup guide and stickers to guide the less-PC-savvy folks out there. I had the PC up and running in less than 10 minutes (including the time to unbox it). All the software was already installed, so only had to answer Windows setup questions at first bootup. Once running the performance was great and the PC is sooo quiet (even when the CPU coolers have spun up when doing a stress-test on the CPU). My daughter loves the LED lighting and I'm kind of fond of it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: The pc itself is great everything works
customer_reviews.text: The pc itself is great everything works. Except changing colors for tower. Will not come on changed batteries in remote still nothing. Even downloaded a program from I buy power web site still nothing. That I'm no happy with. Would be five stars if that worked. Update called tech support and they was great at fixing the problem. Easy to fix great support called and was taken care of fast. So I changed my rating to 5 star. Would definitely recommend this pc to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: tim smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and sooooo pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gaming computer, so everything I say should be taken with a grain of salt. Out of the box I had some trouble setting it up, but once I had everything up and running it is amazing! I have never seen games run this smooth before! I've only had this computer for a few days, but I'm expecting it to last a long time. Bonus, its a gorgeous piece of machinery the lights are great and the front of it is very pleasant to watch (I find myself watching it between games).
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Really fast and pretty device!
customer_reviews.text: I am very, very happy with this purchase. The computer is really pretty, and works perfectly. It's fast, and well-built. The case is really quite stunning and should be displayed on your desk (not tucked under the desk like mine is). Mine only complaint is that the remote control to change the lights doesn't work properly - they have already offered me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: funkyman33

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Great for starters like me, minimal issues so far and came in perfect shape. Great platform to launch from. Issues present so far are minor. No sound card for Motherboard (Uses GPU only and has no L or R channel outputs/HDMI Output only) and needs a hard wire connection to update all drivers as WiFi router quit connecting during updates. Issues were resolved easily and has been running great!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Montalvan Jr

customer_reviews.title: Will not be buying ibuypower again.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this computer for business use, March 21, 2019. Computer is overheating and shuts off daily. Support not willing to work with us, wants us to go a month without having it. That doesn’t work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great computer at a great price, highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic computer, great speed plenty of memory and great video card, Have not had a single problem and it runs 24 hours a day, seven days a week, My wife also has one and it works great. We are very pleased with them, We have had them for a long time now
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Hall

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first gaming pc I have ever purchased and I was very happy with how easy it was to set up. When I first turned on the computer I noticed none of the RGB lights were on and the remote wasn't doing anything. Someone on Reddit said to take off the glass and stick the remote right inside the computer and... "PRESTO" the lights fired right up and the remote functions completely normal after that. It will play any game on Max settings and load up the internet in half a second!
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Very good computer, but because it was shipped I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good computer, but because it was shipped I've had to reseat just about everything inside of it. If you are not computer savvy, you may not want to purchase this because you will have to open it up to make sure it's working correctly. Also the wireless included died for no reason after a year. It's almost been a year and I have to have a friend repair it because of random crashed due to the ram and video card needing to be reseated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need and then some.
customer_reviews.text: For an out of the box gaming ready rig, this thing is perfect! It looks good, Runs well, and is absolutely quiet. There's room for expansion, and this rig can handle most modern games at max right out of the box. Pros: Affordable, powerful, desk appeal, and quiet. Cons: GPU isn't quite as powerful as it's 1080 bigger brother, 16 gigs of ram will need to be upgraded, and you are going to want a bigger SSD for faster game loading.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: FIRST TIME PC GAMER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know anything about PC gaming. What I do know is that I bought this gaming rig, it booted up no problem(some people said they had to change bios..I didn't. It booted up fine), I downloaded steam and played PUBG on ULTRA within 10 minutes!!! I'm very happy so far and I'll keep you updated. I plugged in my Xbox one controller and it was recognized by computer instantly. I am mainly a console player and this is my first jump into PC. I'll he receiving my htc vive VR today and I'll update you on how this rig works with VR.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Really nice computer but some flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice computer! It is really quiet even under load. The cable management is nice but could be better. One of the fans in mine was dead on arrival. The costumer serves and tech support are extremely nice and helpful. They sent me a new fan free of charge. The PC stays cool but without the two fans pulling air from the front I can not say how good it is without adding fans. Over all at $900 (the price I bought it at on prime day) the PC was worth it. I would recommend getting this on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Smooth computer so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few days, so I'll update in a few months if anything changes, but so far this computer is legit. I'm able to run Steam games while multi-tasking on my other monitor without any issues. The case is really simple, making it super easy to upgrade, or customize on your own if needed. Got mine on Prime Day for a solid deal, but even at regular price these are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Davis

customer_reviews.title: Sleek computer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer for my boyfriend, he’s had it for 2 months and is absolutely in love with it! He spends almost all of his free time playing his games and streaming. The computer itself it sleek, quiet and overall a wonderful product. He DOES NOT use the keyboard or mouse it came with, but they’re great to have as back ups. 10 out of 10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MandyP

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase so far
customer_reviews.text: I Love it. No issues with game capture and video commentary full 1080. Only complaint is volume button on my LG tv remote controls lights on tower case. Its very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: applefunk

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful PC for gaming and etc.!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer; make sure you save everything that’s not already on the C drive (SSD) to the D drive (regular SATA drive). I don’t miss not having a built in DVD drive
customer_reviews.author: G-officus

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this a bit on the shorter side. The PC itself looks nice, was delivered on time, and works almost perfectly. The only issue was with the onboard sound not working, but that is an easy workaround (iBUYPOWER's support was also helpful in this situation). So far it has been super quiet and super quick at any task thrown at it. I find it a bit odd that there aren't any expansion bays for drives and no spot for optical drives, but I guess this is the future? For the price of the product it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: First, they boxed in the power supply like plebs. The air circulation is bad, this pc runs hot and expect to have to make numerous changes to fix this. Ran "alright" for a few months and has slowed way down since. For the specs, this should be a beast an it isn't. Disappointed. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Steven Givens

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I've been gaming on what is essentially a potato with memory for almost a decade and I needed to upgrade. This PC all I expected and more and I didn't even have to build it. The two. main upgrades I was looking for was the speed and keeping tower from overheating and it does both with ease. For anyone looking for a gaming PC that can run the newest games and probably upcoming ones too, this computer is all you need
customer_reviews.author: Shanta Claus

customer_reviews.title: Great for VR
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so quiet! Normally I wouldnt care so much, but this is my rift powering PC and its amazingly quiet which is a must for being in the living room with the rift setup. Great price, great PC, without spending twice the price to upgrade just a bit more. At the time of the review the 1070 is more than enough juice to power any game, without spending 1k more to get the 1080 or 1080Ti.
customer_reviews.author: justin thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Double check what you receive!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great computer, but they scammed me with only putting the ssd in and forgetting to also include the hdd.. other than being ripped off for the hard drive, computer works good.
customer_reviews.author: BATL

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming computer!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a gaming laptop with this PC. The laptop had trouble running several games. This PC runs fast on just about every game. The LED light control is a cool feature. The remote didn't come with the computer, but tech support was very helpful and have a remote on the way. There is an app on the computer that can also control the lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: this thing is FAST!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer for my son on prime day. He absolutely loves it. His favorite thing is that he can run games at ultra settings and still have faster frames than he would if he was playing on console. Grand Theft Auto 5 runs like a dream at ultra settings, in fact, it looks like an entirely different game when you play it on this PC. I recommend this PC and I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amy brennan

customer_reviews.title: A decent mid range gaming pc.
customer_reviews.text: Its a lower mid gaming pc, the gtx 1060 3 gig is a little long in the tooth in 2020, it can still handle normal/high at 1080p, but expect to replace it sooner than later. Otherwise its a decent rig, the 87kl prosessor is solid, and the whole thing runs cool. You could probably just build the pc for 900$ but still not a bad deal.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Walker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amzing computer and for the price its unbeatable! Package was amazing and the product showed up un touched. Had to switch the boot drive but other than that it works flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Camesao

customer_reviews.title: Sold a non-functional PC and Terrible Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I bought from ibuypower because of the strong reviews of the company. As soon as I received it and started setting it up I noticed I had issues. I sent it back for a repair after following all of their tech support instructions. I had to send it back three times. After the third I gave up because I truly believed they had no intent on providing me with a working desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PC - works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent PC - works as intended. Cheap dollar store keyboard, so you may want to change that out. We use it with an Oculus rift, and the PC works well in that role. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: AnikaGSD

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, performance and price. Little things could make it better though!
customer_reviews.text: First time I've ever bought a prebuilt pc due to hardware prices skyrocketing lately. This was a much better deal than I could have done with the same parts by myself. Good packaging, quality build overall. All components were as advertised and performance is good. Knocking off a star for terrible cable management job done during assembly. Was just a rats nest hidden in the back of the case. A few zip ties would go a long ways guys! Also one front usb port is not working, need to take a look at the connections.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W

customer_reviews.title: 100% happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have used this computer for a little over 2 months and i have to say it the best pc i have ever owned. The price point for what you get is better to none. I play all my games at ultra settings record videos and even rinder them in 1080p with no issues at all. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Clint Yates

customer_reviews.title: playing at Ultra High settings with Overwatch and many other games have not been so easy. Not only is it quiet
customer_reviews.text: This PC is everything that I wanted and expected it to perform, playing at Ultra High settings with Overwatch and many other games have not been so easy. Not only is it quiet, but the lights are really cool, and there's room for more upgrades if I want to down the line. Furthermore, the mouse and keyboard are really good; the keys on the keyboard feel really nice when pressing, and the mouse feels quite smooth AND it has cool lights on it around the edges. To summarize, this PC is a monster, does everything you expect it to do and its 100% worth the money, would totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes Overwatch playable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer because I was having trouble playing Overwatch on my Asus ROG laptop, even though it was a very good gaming laptop. It works great thus far. Never heats up, quiet, and fast, fast, fast. I'm competing on a level playing field now.
customer_reviews.author: R. Prince

customer_reviews.title: the best pc ive owned so far
customer_reviews.text: the best pc ive owned so far. nice looking fast boot up but this is my first solid state drive. still getting used to windows 10 simple things like were to find control panel it's there just have to access differently. Thought id miss cd/ dvd drive so i bought a slimline cd,dvd,blue ray burner is nice having usb ports on the top of unit works good for me
customer_reviews.author: William Keibler

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get out of console gaming for a while now and finally saved up the money to buy a PC. I was originally going to build my own but seeing as expensive parts have become I went pre-built and have had no complaints with this computer so far. Everything is always working fast, the graphics look great, and haven't had one issue. The only thing I wish it had was an optical port for my astro's but the mix amp still works without it. Great PC, would recommend to anyone looking to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Kruszewski

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best money you are gonna spend right now on a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best money you are gonna spend right now on a top end gaming computer. Forget the 1080 with how expensive they are right now. This computer is where it is at in regards to price, power, and looks. You will easily play Far Cry 5 on Ultra Graphics in 1080p @ 75fps. Now that is amazing. Even trying to build this computer would cost you way more. I would say it is worth it if you are loooking to enter in to computer gaming. This rig will LAST.
customer_reviews.author: John Gunvordahl

customer_reviews.title: I rarely write reviews, but this thing is just ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but this thing is just a beauty. Lightning fast, quality, and worth every penny (and thanks to Amazon's Black Friday price drop!). I've had this in my cart for more than a month-- well worth the wait for me. Just... do it.
customer_reviews.author: Jax L.

customer_reviews.title: Really great pc
customer_reviews.text: Ive been waiting for over 3 years now for a gaming pc and i finally saved up for one working minimum wage and i couldnt be happier it plays any game i throw at it at 60-300fps (higher uncaped) and does any process i ask it to do within seconds. I was going from a i3 640 to a i7 7700k so theres a little diference. If you wanted a tower for a good price and you wanted to boast about how fast your pc is to your friends then this is the pc for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mason jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful PC that delivers great performance.
customer_reviews.text: This PC looks and runs amazing. I've been playing Destiny 2, Call of Duty WW2 and PLAYERUNKNOWNS BATTLEGROUNDS with no problems whatsoever. Ready to go right out of the box. The tempered glass on the case looks beautiful and the RGB lighting is amazing. I've been building my own PC's for a long time and I decided to go with a pre-built this time because of less time due to my job and spending time with the family. I was not dissatisfied the least bit.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Salyer

customer_reviews.title: Overall very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing computer. Super fast and starts up super quick. The only thing is the mouse wheel doesn't scroll for some reason therefore had to switch back to my old mouse. Computer looks great and pretty silent. Would definitely recommend. Great job iBUYPOWER.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I recommend buying just the computer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer with the Acer Gaming Monitor bundle. I want to give a heads up to the people who buy the bundle to also buy the AmazonBasics DisplayPort to DVI Cable- 6 Feet. For that reason, I deduct a star from the bundle. The computer on the other hand is really silent and had no problems booting up. It is safe to say after stalking this computer and its reviews for 3 months, that now is the time to buy the PC because it has no problems as of right now.
customer_reviews.author: Splashypanda

customer_reviews.title: great quality!
customer_reviews.text: my only complaint is that the C drive being forced Read Only was a pain in the ass and was causing conflicts for most of my games setting.ini files. got it fixed though and the computer runs great!
customer_reviews.author: D. Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Its the desktop you just might need
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic computer for my creative needs, I make content with the Adobe Cloud & IBuyPower has never failed to deliver great computers at great prices. I absolutely love & would recommend the RGB LED light system, very aesthetic. Tip: If using a TV as a monitor, be sure to check your aspect ratio of your TV when setting up the system.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this computer and was super happy to receive it. I had to wait all day for it to come and when I finally got it everything looked good. I then found out that my wifi wasn't working. it worked on everything else in my house. I switched to a different network in my house and it worked but I only got 1 bar. I tried everything I could to get it to work, but I'm sending it back. Really really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Holdcraft

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome pc! Shipping was fast
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pc! Shipping was fast! Everything was package well and taken care of during delivery. It boots up quick and responds very well. The keyboard and mouse included are incredible. It's specs are great for intense gaming and allows me to get around online very quickly. It is able to multitask very well.If you are looking for a great pc in this price range, you can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: J&S Milky Way

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: After doing some shopping on the net comparing prices and reading rating of different computers, I purchased IBUYPOWER Elite. I do understand this is a gaming pc and good for editing videos per my two sons. Both are impressed that I even knew about a gaming pc, my sons are die hard gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Torrance Acy-Carter

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard lost letters within 90 days.
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard lost letters within 90 days. I have never had that happen before.
customer_reviews.author: TriciaInTexas

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! Stopped working after a week
customer_reviews.text: It was a great computer...for a week. After I moved it around to plug in my new speakers, it stopped working. I opened it up to make sure nothing was loose inside. It boots up, the fans and lights are running but nothing displays on the screen. Also another user mentioned the wifi antennas being loose on the back panel, I have the same issue. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've made
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box the thing was blazing fast. Everything installed within minutes. I was gaming with ease. It handles everything well on high and above settings. Surprising lack of noise. Only issue is the mouse that comes with it does not have software to control the LED's, a minor issue really, especially considering it came included with the Prime Day cost.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Dellinger

customer_reviews.title: Freaky fast machine
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, freaky fast machine! Bought it on Amazon Prime Days for a great price. A steal even at full price. Great computer!
customer_reviews.author: AnIdahoGuy

customer_reviews.title: Honestly love this computer it has beat my expectations and came ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly love this computer it has beat my expectations and came within a reasonable time don’t regret my purchase and for the price couldn’t beat it would definitely recommend to others knocks out everything you can throw at it with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Gord

customer_reviews.title: At this point in time, for the price, this is a very good PC.
customer_reviews.text: I have no real complaints; I'm going to make some adjustments, like putting in an at least 2 terabyte SSD and upgrading the graphics card at later date, but beyond things like that this is great. I'm not sure what others are looking to get out of a PC, but it blows my old PC & PS4 Pro out of the water for both school work and gaming respectively while also looking very pretty; I cannot say anything negative about the product, barring that it's performance isn't over-killing the requirements to play my games by an even larger margin.
customer_reviews.author: Billum Guynatz

customer_reviews.title: The lights are so nice. The glass sides are very thick and seem ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. He priced out buying all the pieces separately and couldn't beat this price. The lights are so nice. The glass sides are very thick and seem really strong.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Peterson

product_meta.title: iBUYPOWER Elite Gaming PC Computer Desktop Slate2 070i (Intel i7 8700 3.2GHz, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB, 16GB DDR4-2666 RAM, 1TB HDD, 240GB SSD, WiFi Included, Win 10 Home, VR Ready) Black
product_meta.description: Style:i7 8700 | GTX 1060 3GBConquer your enemies and max settings with the iBUYPOWER Elite Series of gaming desktops. The Elite series features the latest generation of high performance Intel Core processors and ultra-quick DDR RAM to easily handle system-intensive tasks, such as high definition video playback and gaming. Coupled with powerful discreet video cards, the iBUYPOWER Elite Series gaming computers provide a smooth gaming and multimedia experience.
feature_bullets: System: Intel Core i7 8700 6-Core Processor 3.20 GHz (4.60 GHz Max Turbo) | 16GB DDR4-2666 RAM | 1TB 7200Rpm HDD | 240GB SSD | Genuine Windows 10 Home 64-bit
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB Dedicated Gaming Video Card | VR Ready | Display Connectors: HDMI, DisplayPort, DVI
Connectivity: 4 x USB 3.0 | 2 x USB 2.0 | 1x RJ-45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000 | Audio: 7.1 Channel

Special Add-Ons: iBUYPOWER signature Slate Tempered glass RGB Gaming Case | 802.11AC Wi-Fi included | 16 Color RGB Lighting Remote Controlled Case | Free iBUYPOWER Gaming Keyboard & RGB Gaming Mouse | No bloatware
Warranty: 1 Year Parts & Labor + Free Lifetime us tech support | Assembled in the U.S.A
